items.title: Acoustic Electric Guitar
items.description: A super nice acoustic electric guitar in good shape for sale.

items.title: Cello
items.description: This cello is in perfect condition. It has been used, but has been taken care of very well.

items.title: White Couch
items.description: This couch is in perfect condition, like brand new. We ony used it for a few months, but now we have to move and can't take it with us.

items.title: Reclining Chair
items.description: This reclining chair is in good condition. It's been used a bit and has some worn out parts. But it's comfy and works great still!

items.title: Brown Dresser
items.description: Really nice brown dresser in good condition. Everything works great on it.

items.title: Dryer
items.description: This dryer is in good condition and works really well. We've only had it for about a year.

items.title: Electric Guitar
items.description: This guitar is a great guitar and still in good conditon. It's been used a lot, but it plays really well still.

items.title: Apple iPad Pro
items.description: Brand new iPad Pro in perfect condition. I won it at a drawing and I already have one and don't need it.

items.title: Apple Macbook Pro 2018 with Touchbar
items.description: Macbook Pro in great condition. Only used it for about a year before I got the new one that came out. Works fantastic!

items.title: Black Grand Piano
items.description: Beautiful black grand piano that plays perfectly. We are moving and can't take it with us. This piano will fill your house with the best sounding piano music ever!

items.title: Burton Snowboard
items.description: Burton snowboard in good condition. Only used it one season.

items.title: Dining Table
items.description: Dining table in good condition. It has some small scratches but is you can't see them unless you look real hard.

items.title: Samsung 72 inch smart TV
items.description: Samsung 72 inch Smart TV in perfect condition. Only 2 years old, and works really good.

items.title: Samsung Washer
items.description: Almost brand new Samsung Wahser in great condition. Works really well and cleans your clothes very well.

items.title: Pro BMX Bike
items.description: Pro bmx bike in good conditon. Fun to ride, super light, small sprocket.

items.title: 2019 Yeti SB150
items.description: Brand new 2019 Yeti SB150 in amazing condition.

items.title: Crib
items.description: Really nice brown crib for sale. Does have some chew marks, but can be touched up.

items.title: Stroller
items.description: Jogging stroller in good condtion. Used only a little bit. Great for long walks.

items.title: Bear Cruzer G2
items.description: Bear Cruzer G2 right handed in great condition and shoots really good. I'm looking to get a new bow this year.

items.title: Centurion 24 Electric Lock Safe
items.description: Toplit Electronic Lock upgrade. Door panel upgrade. 30 min fire rating at 1200 degrees. In great condition.

items.title: 2020 Honda CRF250F
items.description: Like New Honda CRF250F dirt bike. I've only rode it a few times, but I a moving and am not able tot bring it with me.

items.title: 2019 KTM 350 EXC-F
items.description: Really nice KTM dirt bike in really good condition. This is has been an excellent dirt bike for me.

items.title: Old Town Guide Canoe
items.description: This has been sich a good canoe for my family. This model is great because it's slightly wider and extra stable.

items.title: Lifetime Triton Kayak
items.description: This Kayak is in great condition and works really well. I've only taken out in the water a couple times.

items.title: Little Giant Ladder
items.description: Selling this great sturdy ladder that has a lot of adjustments. Supports up to 300lbs.
